vn.uiza.views.overscroll.lib.overscroll

Interface IOverScrollUpdateListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ListenerStubs.OverScrollUpdateListenerStub

    public interface IOverScrollUpdateListener
    A callback-listener enabling over-scroll effect clients to subscribe to real-time updates of over-scrolling intensity, provided as the view-translation offset from pre-scroll position.
    See Also:
    me.everything.android.ui.overscroll.IOverScrollStateListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onOverScrollUpdate(IOverScrollDecor decor, int state, float offset)
      The invoked callback.

    • Method Detail

      • onOverScrollUpdate

        void onOverScrollUpdate(IOverScrollDecor decor,
                        int state,
                        float offset)
        The invoked callback.
        Parameters:
        decor - The associated over-scroll 'decorator'.
        state - One of: me.everything.android.ui.overscroll.IOverScrollState#STATE_IDLE, me.everything.android.ui.overscroll.IOverScrollState#STATE_DRAG_START_SIDE, me.everything.android.ui.overscroll.IOverScrollState#STATE_DRAG_START_SIDE or IOverScrollState.STATE_BOUNCE_BACK.
        offset - The currently visible offset created due to over-scroll.
